about_the_game:
"When I get to high school, I want to help others, just like you did for me."

Synopsis


Now a high school sophomore, Min Woochan recalls memories of an old childhood friend and decides to join the peer counseling club. There, he bonds with three other students, and together, they navigate their days filled with energy and joy, slowly healing from their collective traumas. Yet, the past Woochan thought he had left behind continues to cast its shadow on him...

Game Rules


Guide the fragile high school student, "Woochan", ensuring his Physical Stamina, Mental Stamina, and Reputation levels don't drop to zero. Over the course of 16 weeks, set the right schedules and make the decisions you believe are right to help him complete the semester safely.

Counseling


Complete the counseling sessions assigned each month effectively. The outcomes of these sessions will depend on Woochan's stats and the emotions of those he counsels. Failing to conduct the counseling will result in a drop in his reputation. Additionally, there are "mandatory counseling" sessions which must be attended.

Choices and Sub-quests


Engage with the heroines through a series of choices and sub-quests. Deepen your relationship with them and influence not only Woochan's life but also the lives of those around him.

10+ Multi Endings


Your choices determine who Woochan gets close to and the ending he will experience.

Game Point


-Fully voiced visual novel
-Dynamic animated effects
-Woochan's development through a unique scheduling system

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 32MB or greater graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
